text: "When Your Love is Gone" is a song by Australian singer Jimmy Barnes and is the fourth single from the 1990 album Two Fires. It went to number 7 in Australia and number 17 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== CD single (K 10321) # "When Your Love Is Gone" - 5:12 # "I'm Still On Your Side" (Live) - 4:40 # "One of a Kind" (Live) - 4:43 Category:Rock songs Category:Soul songs Category:1991 songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: When Your Love is Gone
